election_record.label: Massachusetts 1816 Maine Separation, September

overview.note: The Eastern Argus lists 11969 Yea votes and 10347 Nay votes.
The Hallowell Gazette (Hallowell, ME) lists 11927 Yea votes and 10539 Nay votes.

sub_unit.name: Belmont
sub_unit.note: The Boston Weekly Messenger (Boston, MA) lists 23 Yea votes in Belmont.

sub_unit.name: Frankfort
sub_unit.note: The Eastern Argus lists "No Returns" for Frankfort.

sub_unit.name: Lee Plantation
sub_unit.note: The Eastern Argus lists "No Returns" for Lee Plantation.

sub_unit.name: No. 8 and 9
sub_unit.note: The Boston Weekly Messenger (Boston, MA) lists 27 Nay votes in Plantation No. 8 and 9.

sub_unit.name: Farmington
sub_unit.note: The Boston Daily Advertiser, and Repertory (Boston, MA), October 10, and the Boston Weekly Messenger (Boston, MA), October 17, report 35 Nay votes in Farmington.

sub_unit.name: Freedom
sub_unit.note: The Boston Daily Advertiser, and Repertory (Boston, MA), October 10, and the Boston Weekly Messenger (Boston, MA), October 17, report 44 Nay votes in Freedom.

sub_unit.name: Rome
sub_unit.note: The Eastern Argus lists "No Returns" for the town of Rome.

sub_unit.name: Weld
sub_unit.note: The Boston Weekly Messenger (Boston, MA) lists 40 Yea votes and 2 Nay votes in Weld.

sub_unit.name: Guilford
sub_unit.note: The Boston Daily Advertiser, and Repertory (Boston, MA), October 10, and the Boston Weekly Messenger (Boston, MA), October 17, list no Nay votes in Guilford.

sub_unit.name: Addison
sub_unit.note: The Eastern Argus lists "No Returns" for Addison.

sub_unit.name: Calais
sub_unit.note: The Eastern Argus lists "No Returns" for Calais.

sub_unit.name: Lubec
sub_unit.note: The Eastern Argus lists "No Returns" for Lubec.

sub_unit.name: Lebanon
sub_unit.note: The Weekly Visiter (Kennebunk, ME) lists 27 Yea votes and 129 Nay votes in Lebanon.

sub_unit.name: Limington
sub_unit.note: The Weekly Visiter (Kennebunk, ME) lists 70 Yea votes and 30 Nay votes in Limington.

sub_unit.name: Waterboro
sub_unit.note: The Weekly Visiter (Kennebunk, ME) lists 52 Yea votes in Waterboro.
